mapper.insert: insert into t_order (order_id, supplier, order_no, order_type, contract_code, distribution_type, pay_type, receive_warehouse, file_url, sender, sender_phone, send_province, send_city, send_district, send_address, send_time, pack_require, receiver, receiver_phone, receiver_province, receiver_city, receive_district, receive_address, remarks, create_time, group_id,company_id) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributionType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveWarehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{packRequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update t_order set supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distribution_type = #{distributionType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_warehouse = #{receiveWarehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender = #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender_phone = #{senderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_province = #{sendProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_city = #{sendCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_district = #{sendDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_address = #{sendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pack_require = #{packRequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_province = #{receiverProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_city = #{receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_district = #{receiveDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_address = #{receiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT} company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select order_id, supplier, order_no, order_type, contract_code, distribution_type, pay_type, receive_warehouse, file_url, sender, sender_phone, send_province, send_city, send_district, send_address, send_time, pack_require, receiver, receiver_phone, receiver_province, receiver_city, receive_district, receive_address, remarks, create_time, group_id,company_id from t_order where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
